com.github.misberner.buildergen.annotations

Annotation Type GenerateBuilder


  • @Retention(value=SOURCE)
@Target(value={CONSTRUCTOR,METHOD})
public @interface GenerateBuilder
    Automatically generate a builder for the annotated instantiator.

    An instantiator can either be a constructor of a top-level or static inner class, or a static method. Annotating constructors of non-static inner classes or non-static methods with this annotation will result in an error.

    The type returned by the creation method will be determined as follows:

    • if the instantiator is a constructor, the return type will be the same as the defining class.
    • if the instantiator is a static method, the return type will be the same as of this method.
    Author:
    Malte Isberner

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean builderFinal
      Whether or not the generated builder is a final class (true by default).
      boolean builderPublic
      Whether or not the generated builder is a public class (true by default).
      String createName 
      Class<?> defaults
      The class containing the default values for the options.
      String[] getterPrefix
      The prefix to use for getter methods.
      String name
      The name of the generated builder.
      Visibility optionVisibility
      The default visibility of option attributes.
      String packageName
      The name of the package in which the builder is defined.
      String setterPrefix
      The prefix to use for setter methods.
      String value
      The name of the generated builder.
      String withPrefix
      The prefix to use for with methods.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        The name of the generated builder. This field is only taken into account when the name attribute is set to the empty string. If this field is empty, the default builder name (see above) will be used.
        Default:
        ""

      • name

        public abstract String name
        The name of the generated builder. If this field is set to the empty string, the value of the value attribute is used, if this is specified and non-empty. Otherwise, the default builder name (see above) will be used.
        Default:
        ""

      • packageName

        public abstract String packageName
        The name of the package in which the builder is defined. If the empty string is specified, the package will be the same as that of the instantiator.
        Default:
        ""

      • getterPrefix

        public abstract String[] getterPrefix
        The prefix to use for getter methods. If a second value is specified, this will be used as an alternate prefix for boolean attributes. Specifying more than two values will result in a warning, but is not an error (only the first two values will be considered). Specify AccessorMethods.SUPPRESS to prevent getters from being generated by default.
        Default:
        {"get", "is"}

      • setterPrefix

        public abstract String setterPrefix
        The prefix to use for setter methods. Specify AccessorMethods.SUPPRESS to prevent setters from being generated by default.
        Default:
        "set"

      • withPrefix

        public abstract String withPrefix
        The prefix to use for with methods. Specify AccessorMethods#SUPPRESS_WITHS to prevent with methods from being generated by default.
        Default:
        "with"

      • defaults

        public abstract Class<?> defaults
        The class containing the default values for the options. If Void is specified, a class called "$BuilderDefaults" declared on the same level as the instantiator will be used if it exists.
        Default:
        java.lang.Void.class

      • builderPublic

        public abstract boolean builderPublic
        Whether or not the generated builder is a public class (true by default).
        Default:
        true

      • builderFinal

        public abstract boolean builderFinal
        Whether or not the generated builder is a final class (true by default).
        Default:
        true

      • optionVisibility

        public abstract Visibility optionVisibility
        The default visibility of option attributes. The default is Visibility.PRIVATE. Specifying Visibility.INHERIT will result in a warning, but have the same effect Visibility.PRIVATE.
        Default:
        com.github.misberner.buildergen.annotations.Visibility.PRIVATE

      • createName

        public abstract String createName
        Default:
        "create"
